page.title: 08Events (Gwyddelwern) Page 2
page.content: {Fund Raising Events}- Sale of Works and Coffee Evenings are the most popular fund raisers but concerts, plays and fashion shows are sometimes staged. Most events are held in the Village Hall. {Carol Service}- One of the most popular events is the service at Christmas given by the local primary children under the leadership of their teachers. They never fail to capture our hearts and lead us joyfully into the festive season. {Carol Singing}- Members of the 'Cymdeithas' entertain us with door to door carol singing and a collection is made for various charities. Mrs Gwenfydd Lewis.
